settings.author: Augustus
settings.quote: Aurum Stories from start to finish really understood my vision and helped bring my ideas to life, creating a unique and beautiful engagement ring. The attention to detail and craftsmanship along with their deep knowledge of gem stones and fine jewelry is unprecedented. I would highly recommend in trusting Aurum Stories in creating something special for your loved ones.

settings.author: Olivia
settings.quote:
Creating a piece of jewellery with Aurum Stories
                        has been so special! Not only is the piece of sentimental value,
                        but seeing the design and walking through each stage was
                        so useful to making those crucial decisions with the
                        design elements.

settings.author: Monika
settings.quote:
Excellent communication and step-by-step photos
                        and explanations of the whole custom design process
                        really demystified the creation of the beautiful pieces.
                        Aurum Stories brings a lot of knowledge and care to the
                        design and manufacturing process, creating unique pieces
                        that I'll treasure.

settings.author: Emily
settings.quote:
A really exciting and interesting process in
                        sourcing my perfect stone! Aurum Stories are incredibly
                        knowledgeable and provided an excellent service in
                        finding a beautiful sapphire, as well as a fascinating
                        insight into the industry. A safe pair of hands sourcing
                        something so special and really fun too as a fellow
                        magpie!

settings.author: Ruairidh & Fiona
settings.quote:
Aurum Stories were great at listening to us,
                        understanding what we wanted and why, sourcing the best
                        products and turning out awesome hand drawn designs and
                        wax models for us to look at and tweak to our desired
                        outcome. These were so helpful in finalizing our designs
                        and understanding what we could expect. We were really
                        impressed with the process, communication and attention
                        to detail and of course delighted with the final
                        outcome.
